svg.text: Figure 2: Computational Behavior DNA Generation Process Flow

g.text: System Calls • Network Traffic • Memory Patterns • CPU Usage • I/O Operations
256-bit DNA Hash • Temporal Chaining • Quantum-Safe Validation

svg.text: DNA(t) = SHA3-256(FeatureVector(t) || AgentID || Timestamp(t) || DNA(t-1) || Salt)
